namespace.name: fort
namespace.doc:
# `fort` namespace
This is the base namespace that prefixes any public or private interface of any FORT code.
For example :
* [hermes](https://github.com/formicidae-tracker/hermes.git) uses the `hermes` namespace * [fort-tags](https://github.com/formicidae-tracker/hermes.git) uses the `tags` namespace
The myrmidon API owns the myrmidon namespace.
